newsitem.title: BELGIUM: PETROFINA AIMS FOR SEPT 3 NYSE LISTING.
newsitem.headline: PETROFINA AIMS FOR SEPT 3 NYSE LISTING.

text.p: Belgian oil and gas group PetroFina said on Monday it hoped its shares would be listed on the New York Stock Exchange from September 3, although the U.S. Securities and Exchange Commission (SEC) was still considering its application.

"We have redrafted our last three years accounts according to U.S. GAAP (accounting standards). They will be presented to the SEC in the coming weeks...and we hope the SEC process will be complete by the end of June," PetroFina chief executive officer Francois Cornelis told the company's annual shareholders meeting.

Cornelis said there were no major differences between PetroFina's reported results and those adjusted to comply with the U.S. accounting standard. He said the company did not want to list in New York over the summer and so was targeting September instead.
